imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Square black-and-white brand logo on a white background (ccpg-logo-top.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Add the user-uploaded logo image ("CCPG logo.png") as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated, and update the top-of-page (hero) logo in frontend/src/components/landing/sections/HeroSection.tsx to use this new asset instead of the current /assets/generated/ccpg-logo-transparent.dim_512x128.png.

new_feature_requests.summary: Replace only the main top-of-page (header) logo with the new provided logo (do not change logos elsewhere).

projectName: Replace only the top-of-page hero logo with uploaded CCPG logo
